oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Civil Defense disaster drill, 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scenes from the 1965 disaster drills of the Nashville Metropolitan Government Department of Civil Defense personnel in coordination with rescue units. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 23 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil defense--Tennessee--Nashville; Civil defense drills--Tennessee--Nashville; Emergency management--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville
